entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
